subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN2325 is on the way

conversations.body_text: Hi gibo,    Sorry, your parcel has been delayed due to transshipment. Here is your UPS tracking number: 1ZB87C390415171215.  It is expected to be delivered to you within the next two days.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=1ZB87C390415171215
